body.name: DOMICON L Shaped Gaming Desk, Home Office desks, 47 inch Computer Desk with LED Lights & Adjustable Stand, Power Outlets & Storage Drawer, Reversible Computer Desk with Shelves & Headset Hooks
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 13 hrs 42 mins
features: 【L Gaming DESK with LED Lights】This modern black desk perfect for small spaces features an RGB light strip under the monitor stand. You can switch the light color at will according to your mood and use scene. Life needs a sense of ritual. 7 main colors and up to 20 dynamic modes of colorful lights make your life relaxing. Try DIY your room and add an immersive game

【4 Levels Adjustable Monitor Stand】DOMICON latest designed adjustable monitor stand (patent pending) has 4 adjustable heights (7.5-5.5Inch), suitable for people of different heights. It is more ergonomic, maintains a correct sitting posture, and protects the health of your cervical spine and spine.

【Game Desk with Power Outlets】DOMICON Gaming L-shaped table is equipped with 4 AC power outlets + 2 USB charging ports, bringing great convenience to users for gaming or home office. Easily charge your PC, PS4, smartphone, Bluetooth, power bank or gaming device. Rated power: 1500W; AC power outlet: 120V/12A; USB port: 5V 2.2A

【Desk with Extra Large Storage】The enlarged fabric drawer can provide you with private storage space to store stationery, office supplies, and iPad. The oversized storage pocket on the side stores various documents, magazines, and even your inspiration drafts, and there are 2 storage shelves on the side. Allows you to store office, game supplies, and computer hosts

【Reversible Design】With a reversible design, it can be perfectly suitable for every corner, whether in the bedroom, study, or office. It can be installed in two directions to maximize the use of limited space.

【Easy Assembly--40 min 】We provide the tools required for installation and a step-by-step installation video. With clear and concise installation instructions, even one person can install this table in 40 minutes.

【Lifetime Service】Quick reply within 24 hours. Parts warehouses all over the US. Make after-sales service easier and effective.Two-year warranty, DOMICON takes full responsibility for any quality issue. Please feel free to contact us if you have any other concern.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Headphone Hook The headphone hook keeps your headphones from being placed everywhere Fabric Drawer for Storage Fabric drawers can store stationery, office supplies, and other private items. Super practical design! Adjustable shelf Extra large storage space, can store host, power supply and other large equipment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate gaming bliss
reviews.reviewText: This gaming desk exceeded my expectations in both design and functionality. Its sleek, ergonomic build provides ample space for my setup, accommodating multiple monitors and peripherals with ease. The sturdy construction ensures durability during intense gaming sessions, while thoughtful cable management keeps everything tidy. The customizable features, including height adjustment and RGB lighting, enhance the overall gaming experience. Assembly was straightforward, and the desk's modern aesthetic seamlessly integrates into my gaming room. A fantastic investment for any avid gamer seeking a stylish and practical gaming workstation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Nice
reviews.reviewText: I like the sturdiness of the desk and the fact that you can set its tower stand up on the right or left if you choose. It has a fabric drawer and a side pocket - both very useful. There’s a texture on the top of the desk that prevents things like pens from rolling off. It’s a beautiful desk but not too big for smaller rooms. Love this desk! Took abt two hours or so to put together with two people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini shelf is terrible quality cracked on assembly LED strip subpar
reviews.reviewText: Quality on main desk is good. But the shelf that sits on top of the desk is poor. Very disappointed that when I was assembling the shelf it cracked as shown in the picture. This happened before the screw was even tight. The LED strip is a cool accent but about a week or so in it would randomly turn itself on then a few days later the remote stopped working.UPDATE:Seller reached out and is working to resolve the issues. Very quick and professional. They have great customer service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great looking desk led light stopped working first day.
reviews.reviewText: First off package came damaged but desk was okay no damage. Second pay real close attention to the details if flipping the l shape side. Even if you do you still might have to backtrack, it’s part of the experience. Okay when installing the screws that hold the plugs down on the desk, be prepared to replace those screws with some short ones that have bigger girth as the ones included are to small to hold it down when you start pulling plugs out . Trust me on this one get the fattest screw you can fit in the hole but not too long. Finally be prepared that the led light will stop working. Ours did on day one, stuck on white light no remote contact remote working it’s just not having any affect. The desk though looks great my kid LOVES it but be warned the things above are real issues you should prepare for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it but light stopped working
reviews.reviewText: This desk is easy to put together and the little YouTube videos help a lot if you are putting it together alone. I love how it’s interchangeable for which side you want the L on. The storage draw and pocket are great! It’s a great go to start desk for a gamer! Only sad part is the LED lights just stopped working. We tried unplugging and plugging it back in. We tried changing the battery on the remote. Nothing worked. So that kinda sucks but it’s still a great desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Besides a little hiccups on my part it was easy to put together. My sons loves it much more than his old desk. We love the light which I hope continues to work according to some other reviews. I purchased extra light strips just in case. Seems sturdy and I like the carbon fiber look.Update after three weeks the led light that it came with when out. Glad I got extra hopefully I can get the old one off to put better lights on there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice gaming desk for kids room
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. The desktop piece itself looks very nice. Drawer is a little small but the folder on the side is very useful. Overall good product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Gamer Desk
reviews.reviewText: Quality gaming table with storage space and nice aesthetics!
